item.title: Overgrown grass, 8th June
item.description:
The grass verge in planets lane is seriously overgrown Tewkesbury borough council have previously attended to it however they have said it is the responsibility of Gloucestershire Council now. The grass has not been cut in over 12 months and in places around a meter in height Please can it be attended to and cut as soon as possible
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Planets Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The area of grass opposite 23 Planets Lane requires serious attention- it is extremely overgrown, messy and weeds everywhere, 8th June
item.description:
The location of the problem occurs opposite 23 Planets Lane down to 12 Planets Lane It has come to my attention that this was maintained regularly by Tewkesbury Borough Council on behalf of yourselves, and this agreement has now terminated - please ensure this is actioned as soon as possible as it is now over a metre in height.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Planets Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over Grown branches, 8th June
item.description:
All the trees on St Georges road outside the George Hotel are over grown and the branches have now grown so much that they are only about >1metre above the permit cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Saint Georges Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown Tree, 8th June
item.description:
The tree outside number 57 St George's road is extremely overgrown and is touching the building which is Grade II* listed. It needs to be cut in half.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Saint Georges Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bushes around trees are overgrown, 8th June
item.description:
The bushes growing on the bottom of the trees are overgrown again. They grow into the permit parking so stop cars being able to use that space. They also block the view of cars coming if you want to cross the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Saint Georges Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th June
item.description:
The constant stream of detritus continues. After a whole 48 hours since the last lot was cleared….. this has arrived. Fly tipping is a criminal offence. Why does Cheltenham Borough Council turn a blind eye to it?? Put a camera up and catch and fine those responsible please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 191, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
